sen.j: 寛信（かんしん・かんじん、応徳元年（1084年） － 仁平3年3月7日 (旧暦)（1153年4月2日））は、平安時代後期の真言宗の僧。
sen.e: Kanshin(born in 1084 and passed away on April 2, 1153) was a Shingon sect priest in the latter Heian period.

sen.e: He learned San-lun Teachings from Kakuju at Todai-ji temple and esoteric points of Shingon sect Ono school from Genkaku at Kanshu-ji temple.

sen.e: He assumed Betto (the superior of a temple) of Kanshu-ji temple and worked hard for the provision of Hokke hakko (ceremonial series of eight lectures on the eight scrolls of the Lotus Sutra) at the temple.
